item.title: HELOC Application Process: Step-by-Step Guide for 2025
item.description:
Applying for a HELOC can seem daunting, but understanding the process helps ensure a smooth experience. Here’s your complete guide to the HELOC application process in 2025.

Pre-Application Preparation

1. Check Your Credit Score

  • Minimum typically 680+
  • Higher scores get better rates
  • Review credit report for errors

2. Calculate Your Home Equity

  • Recent home value estimate
  • Current mortgage balance
  • Typical LTV limits: 80-90%

3. Gather Required Documents

  • Recent pay stubs
  • Tax returns (2 years)
  • Bank statements
  • Property tax records
  • Insurance documentation
